sentences.sContent: There is overwhelming evidence that smoking damages your health.
sentences.sCn: 有难以辩驳的证据表明吸烟有损健康。

sentences.sContent: An overwhelming majority of the members were against the idea.
sentences.sCn: 占压倒性多数的成员反对这项主张。

sentences.sContent: The proposal has been given overwhelming support.
sentences.sCn: 这一提议得到了压倒性多数的支持。

sentences.sContent: The British Air Force succeeded despite overwhelming odds against them.
sentences.sCn: 英国空军虽然处境极为不利，但还是完成了任务。

sentences.sContent: ...Companies are pushing it hard but make it almost overwhelming even to dip a toe in the water for the average consumer...
...The overwhelming majority of employees attribute their stress mainly to low pay and an excessive workload...
...Those simultaneous challenges appear less overwhelming with increasingly better answers to a centuries-old question: how to make power portable...
...The overwhelming conclusion when you put this enormous literature together is that there is no clear academic advantage of sitting in all-female or all-male classes...

exam.question: Of the thousands of known volcanoes(火山) in the world, the ______ majority are inactive.

answer.explain: the overwhelming majority压倒性的多数。句意： 世界上数以千计的已知的火山中， 绝大多数是死火山。tremendous： 极大的， 巨大的； demanding： 过分要求的， 苛刻的； intensive： 强烈的， 精深的。

trans.tranOther: very large or greater, more important etc than any other
